text: The Blue Notebook () is a 1963 Soviet drama film directed by Lev Kulidzhanov. == Plot == The film takes place in the summer of 1917. Lenin leaves Petrograd and, together with Grigory Zinoviev, hides in a hut in Razliv. There he begins work on his famous The Blue Notebook, realizing that revolution is necessary for Russia.Синяя тетрадь == Cast == * Mikhail Kuznetsov as V.I.
